description:
Alterations to existing building including excavation of front elevation, new roofs front facade, new railings and erection of a rear ground floor extension and first floor extension.  Also Conservation Area consent reference P082596 submitted
This application may affect the character and appearance of a conservation area and the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Section 67 and 73.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposal by reason of its design, scale and massing  would detract from the amenities of the adjoining residential unit within 183  Barnsbury Road. The proposed extension would have a detrimental impact on the outlook from the lower ground floor unit and would result in an increased sense of enclosure. The proposal is therefore considered contrary to Islington's Unitary Development  Plan policiy D3 (Design and Layout).
